module.title: Resource: Versions
module.description:
General storage versions of module contents.
The purpose of this module is to provide a general database model and table to save older versions of contents managed by other models.
Usage to save: code> $logic = Logic_Versions::getInstance( $env ); $logic->add( 'MyModule', 15, "Outdated content" ); <code This example will save "Outdated content" in relation to module "MyModule" entry 15.
Usage to list: code> $logic = Logic_Versions::getInstance( $env ); $logic->getAll( 'MyModule', 15 ); <code This example will list all stored versions related to module "MyModule" entry 15.
Usage to load: code> $logic = Logic_Versions::getInstance( $env ); $logic->get( 'MyModule', 15, 3 ); <code This example will load version 3 of related to module "MyModule" entry 15. To load the latest version skip the third parameter.
module.log: Migrate to use newer database classes.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>versions`; CREATE TABLE `<%?prefix%>versions` ( `versionId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `module` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `id` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `version` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL, `content` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `timestamp` decimal(12,0) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`versionId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `module` (`module`), KEY `id` (`id`), KEY `version` (`version`), KEY `timestamp` (`timestamp`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
